fields.title: Comparison between Dataset = {{dataset}} , Filter = {{filter}}
fields.sql: SELECT ({{ timestampColumn }}), {{ filterDimensions.0 }}, SUM({{ metrics.0 }}) as {{metrics.0}} FROM ({{ datasetSql|safe }}) WHERE {{filter|safe}} GROUP BY 1, 2 limit 500

fields.title: Dataset = {{dataset}} , Filter = {{filter}}
fields.sql: SELECT ({{ timestampColumn }}), SUM({{ metrics.0 }}) as {{metrics.0}} FROM ({{ datasetSql|safe }}) WHERE {{filter|safe}} GROUP BY 1 limit 500
